The investigator investigate hypothesis manipulate macronutrient content diet alter level glycogen muscle , turn , substrate oxidation exercise .
DOC.brief_title: Dietary Macronutrient Manipulation Substrate Oxidation During Exercise
DOC.detailed_description: One way help reduce body fat expend energy oxidation fat fuel . Exercise one way increase fat oxidation . The extent exercise facilitate use fat fuel may influence individual 's dietary intake . This study aim establish effect dietary macronutrient manipulation muscle glycogen level substrate oxidation exercise . Participants undertake three separate trial period . During trial period participant consume diet contain different macronutrient composition . For trial investigator assess macronutrient composition diet affect muscle glycogen level substrate oxidation exercise .

Participation another clinical study receipt investigational drug within 30 day screen visit . Previous participation study . Recent history ( within last year ) alcohol substance abuse .
